#5.3
Start Performance Tuning
To start performance tuning, start the Debugger in a data collection mode.  Move into your program's directory and type:  

		cvspeed 
Let's start the Debugger with a program.
Your program "test" is located in the /usr/people/guest/program directory.  

Use the shell on the right to start the Debugger with your program.
cd 
/usr/people/guest/program
cvspeed
Sorry.  You must first move into the /usr/people/guest/program directory using the cd command.
Sorry.  To start the Debugger with your "test" program, type: cvspeed
